name: Love in Georgia
description:
Have you ever wanted to find love in a new country?

Journey through the streets of Tbilisi, Georgia and seek out the girl of your dreams.

Who will you fall for? How will the adventure end?
Only you can decide...

If the game does not load above try accessing it here: https://playspinoff.com/games/630ca9562281ca1b6869a5eb
or in the Apple App Store

Love in Georgia is an interactive fiction game made by Ai Daive and @Fantastisktaiart for Spinoff

Find us on Instagram and see what other games we are working on!

https://www.instagram.com/fantastisktaiart/
